name: Eunoia
description: A compassionate AI assistant for mental wellbeing that performs emotional check-ins, analyzes reflections, and provides supportive, context-aware responses.

emotional_check_ins.description: Automatic detection and tracking of mood expressions

reflection_analysis.description: AI-powered sentiment analysis and theme extraction from reflections

context_awareness.description: Maintains conversation history and user patterns for personalized support

privacy.data_retention: User data is stored for providing personalized support
privacy.data_usage: Conversation history, mood tracking, and reflections are used to provide context-aware responses
privacy.disclaimer: This is a wellbeing support tool and should not replace professional mental health care
